title: Robert518
author: Robert518
content: On August 26, CryptoLeaks published an investigation suggesting that Ava Labs, the firm behind the Avax cryptocurrency, initiated assaults on competitors in order to stymie their growth.Solana, Binance, and Dfinity Foundation are among the competitors mentioned in the paper.According to CryptoLeaks, Ava Labs is presently collaborating with Roche Freedman, a law company that "widely sues persons in cryptocurrency, currently operating at least 25 class lawsuits."Ava Labs has been "working under an unprecedented secret deal that hurts the crypto business and has a character so perverted that it compromises the integrity of the American legal system," according to CryptoLeaks.Continue Reading: https://mycryptoparadise.com/ava-labs-ceo-slams-cryptoleaks-following-evil-conspiracy-publication/
